name: Sit in a Box 2D
description:
Welcome, Employee 0623

In this facility your job is simple. Click a button!

Don't worry I'm sure you'll be good at this!

Now, what are you waiting for?

This is my first game made in unity and I'll update it as much as I can.

However, my arm is currently broken which makes coding the game harder.

Also this is a remake (kinda) of a game I already made called: Sit in a box and click a button

Anyways,  I hope you enjoy!
